article_title: Pennsylvania's budget mess is going from bad to worse

og.description: Pennsylvania will be facing a $2.4 billion budget shortfall by 2016 budget year. Just two years ago, the shortfall in 2016 was projected to be $1.7 billion
og.title: Pennsylvania's budget mess is going from bad to worse - Watchdog.org
